subject: Executives and Management
Coaches and Managers
Automobile Racing
Automobiles
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: For the first time in many years, there have been no large scandals or public clashes among team owners and directors, or between the teams and the Formula One authorities.
snippet: For the first time in many years, there have been no large scandals or public clashes among team owners and directors, or between the teams and the Formula One authorities.
